fields.message: Note: these settings apply to all header elements of your website. You can override some global setting for individual pages.

fields.label: Blank spacer under header
fields.name: global_header_menu_add_cap
fields.instructions: We recommend use this setting for transparent and fixed header navigation

fields.label: Sticky header
fields.name: global_header_menu_fixed
fields.instructions: Enable sticky header, when you scrolling the page

fields.label: Sticky header on mobile
fields.name: global_header_mobile_menu_fixed
fields.instructions: Enable sticky header on mobile devices

fields.label: Initial offset
fields.name: global_header_fixed_initial_offset
fields.instructions: Scroll position when sticky header begins to animate | Use pixels

fields.label: Typography
fields.name: global_header_fixed_text_typo
fields.instructions: Set up typography styles for sticky header

fields.label: Bottom border
fields.name: global_fixed_header_menu_hide_border
fields.instructions: Hide bottom border from sticky header?

fields.label: Menu type
fields.name: global_menu_type
fields.instructions: Choose menu type for all pages

fields.label: Overlay menu layout
fields.name: global_fullscreen_menu_style
fields.instructions: Choose layout type for overlay menu

fields.label: Overlay menu typography
fields.name: global_fullscreen_menu_text_typo
fields.instructions: Set up typography styles for fullscreen menu

fields.label: Dropdown carets
fields.name: global_header_dropdown_carets_visibility
fields.instructions: Show carets on multi level menu

fields.label: Mobile menu typography
fields.name: global_mobile_menu_typo
fields.instructions: Set up typography for mobile menu

fields.label: Social icons position
fields.name: global_header_mobile_social_position
fields.instructions: Show or hide social icons on mobile menu

fields.label: Lang switcher position
fields.name: global_header_mobile_lang_position
fields.instructions: Choose WPML lang switcher position on mobile devices

fields.label: Cart icon position
fields.name: global_header_mobile_cart_position
fields.instructions: Choose cart icon position on mobile devices

fields.label: Visibility
fields.name: global_header_use_hero
fields.instructions: Hide header title from all pages?

fields.label: Fullscreen height
fields.name: global_header_height_fullscreen
fields.instructions: Enable fullscreen height for header title?

fields.label: Background type
fields.name: global_header_title_background_type
fields.instructions: Choose background type for header title

fields.label: Background image
fields.name: global_header_title_background_image
fields.instructions: Upload background image for header title

fields.label: Background overlay
fields.name: global_header_use_overlay
fields.instructions: Add colored overlay over background image?

fields.label: Title settings
fields.name: global_header_tilte_typo
fields.instructions: Set up typograhy for hero titles

fields.label: Onepage scroll menu
fields.name: global_header_onepage_mode
fields.instructions: Enable onepage scroll menu? Handle anchor links as section scroll trigger. Read more in docs.

fields.label: Social links
fields.name: global_header_menu_social_links
fields.instructions: Add links to your social network groups (max. 6)
